org.opentcs.data.model

Class StaticRoute

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.data.TCSObject<StaticRoute>
      • org.opentcs.data.model.StaticRoute
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class StaticRoute
extends TCSObject<StaticRoute>
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    A named static route that can be used as an alternative to dynamically computing a route for a vehicle.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Checks whether this static route is valid or not. A static route is valid if it has at least two hops.
        Returns:
        true if, and only if, this static route is valid.
